alert.note: Alert for Mono (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 25 at 4:08AM PST until December 28 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches, except 10 to 20 inches above 8000 feet possible. Wind gusts near 60 mph possible with 100+ mph along the Sierra crest. * WHERE...Mono County. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: Now is the time to prepare an emergency kit for your home and car. If traveling consider alternate plans, remember to carry tire chains, extra food, water and clothing. Once the storm arrives, travel may be difficult or impossible for an extended period of time.
